Package flex2.compiler.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLogger
    A partial Logger implemenation, which adds some localization related functionality.
    Benchmark
    A utility class used to record how long certain tasks take to run.
    CompilerControl
    A utility class primarily used to short circuit compilation, like when an IDE wants to abort a compilation and start over after a file has changed.
    ConsoleLogger
    A Logger implementation that uses System.err and System.out to output messages.
    ManifestParser
    Parses a manifest into a NameMappings.
    MimeMappings
    Map MIME types to file extensions
    Name
    A common base class for MultiName and QName to enable putting them in Map's and Set's together.
    NameFormatter
    AS3 definition name conversion utilities.
    NameMappings
    Stores the mappings of name and uri to classname.
    PerformanceData
    Data to describe the performance of a class method.
    QName
    This class represents a namespace URI and local part.
    ThreadLocalToolkit
    A utility class that contains all the thread local variables used by the compiler.
    URLPathResolver
    A resolver with tries to resolve paths using the URL class.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CompilerMessage
    This class provides a common base class for all localizable exceptions thrown by the compiler.
    CompilerMessage.CompilerError  
    CompilerMessage.CompilerInfo  
    CompilerMessage.CompilerWarning  
    ManifestParser.DuplicateComponentDefinition  
    ManifestParser.InvalidClassName  
    ManifestParser.ManifestError  
    ManifestParser.UndefinedClass
